education.major: Expert in Engineering and management of Digital Communication

experience.title: Fullstack freelancer
description: Collaborated with technical and business staff in design, development and implementation.
Developed a broad spectrum of web services, from small agencies websites to back offices.

experience.title: Lead developer
description: Organized and performed a complete tech stack migration to secure a smooth scalability.
Setup, manage and monitor systems to ensure business continuity.
Responsible for developing and maintaining all the concurrent and linked projects of the company, from online administration tools to mobile apps.

experience.title: Front-end developer
description: Worked on a lot of different projects, mostly in React and Wordpress.
Formalized new development processes for the whole technical team.

experience.title: Front-end developer
description: Worked mainly on Wordpress projects with custom themes and some custom core Symfony websites.

projects.name: Chrissen Rajathurai
projects.description: A GastbyJS portfolio I made for a friend and former student with me at HETIC. It was designed by him with some specific animations/transitions in mind that I recreated with the help of GSAP. A little but fun and dynamic website.

projects.name: Digital Village
projects.description: Digital Village does everything an agency mixed with a coworking place could do. I helped them as a freelancer for some of their projects and was the main contributor for their corporate website. It runs on Wordpress with a custom theme and GSAP to make it smooth.
